import unittest

[tool.black]
line-length = 119
target-version = ['py37']

[tool.ruff]
# Never enforce `E501` (line length)
ignore = E501

[isort]
default_section = FIRSTPARTY
ensure_newline_before_comments = True
force_grid_wrap = 0
include_trailing_comma = True
line_length = 120
multi_line_output = 3
not_skip = __init__.py
order_by_type = True
project = pydantic
remove_comments = True
skip =
    __pycache__
    build
    dist
    docs
    .mypy_cache
    .pytest_cache
    .tox
    .venv
    .venv3
    .venv3.7
    .venv3.8
    .venv3.9
    .venv3.10
    .venv3.11
    .venv3.12

# HuggingFace Transformers

[![PyPI version](

.PHONY: quality style test docs utils

check_dirs := tests src examples benchmarks utils

# Check that all directories exist
check_dirs := $(foreach dir,$(check_dirs),$(if $(wildcard $(dir)),,$(error Directory $(dir) does not exist)))

# Check that all directories are empty
check_dirs := $(foreach dir,$(check_dirs),$(if $(shell find $(dir) -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d),,$(error Directory $(dir) is not empty)))

# Check that all directories are executable
check_dirs := $(foreach dir,$(check_dirs),$(if $(shell find $(dir) -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d

accelerate # used to be installed in Amazon SageMaker environment
evaluate

import unittest

[tool.black]
line-length = 119
target-version = ['py37']

[tool.ruff]
# Never enforce `E501` (line length)
ignore = E501

[tool.isort]
# Never enforce `E501` (line length)
line_length = 119

[tool.flake8]
# Never enforce `E501` (line length)
ignore = E501

[isort]
default_section = FIRSTPARTY
ensure_newline_before_comments = True
force_grid_wrap = 0
include_trailing_comma = True
line_length = 120
multi_line_output = 3
not_skip = __init__.py
order_by_type = True
project = firstparty
remove_comments = True
skip =.git,__pycache__,.mypy_cache,__pypackages__,.venv,__pycache__,.pytest_cache,__pycache__,.mypy_cache,__pypackages__,.venv,__pycache__,.pytest_cache,__pycache__,.mypy_cache,__pypackages__,.venv,__pycache__,.pytest_cache,__

# HuggingFace Transformers

[HuggingFace

.PHONY: quality style test docs utils

check_dirs := tests src examples benchmarks utils

# Check that all directories exist
check_dirs:
	@for dir in $(check_dirs); do \
		if [! -d $$dir ]; then \
			echo "Directory $$dir does not exist"; \
			exit 1; \
		fi; \
	done

# Check that all files are formatted with black
black:
	black --check $(check_dirs)

# Check that all files are formatted with isort
isort:
	isort --check $(check_dirs)

# Check that all files are formatted with flake8
flake8:

accelerate # used to be installed in Amazon SageMaker environment
evaluate
datasets==2.3.2
diffusers==0.17.0
fastai==2.5.1
fastprogress==1.0.0
gluonnlp==0.14.0
huggingface-hub==0.1.0
importlib-metadata==4.0.1
imageio==2.9.0
importlib-resources==5.1.2
ipykernel==5.4.2
ipywidgets==7.6.3
jedi==0.18.0
joblib==1.0.1
jsonlines==1.2.
